response.overview: The journey of the Ensemble Viaggiatori Armonici in a country like Brazil to the performance at the iconic Capela Santa Maria in Curitiba. Also, a musical journey that celebrates the fusion of two cultures, the Italian and the Brazilian, cemented by a shared passion for music. A documentary that recounts the journey that the musical ensemble Viaggiatori Armonici undertook in 2019 to a country like Brazil to perform at the Capela Santa Maria in Curitiba.
response.title: Iperreale - Viaggiatori Armonici in Brazil
